      Ship createShip(double x, double y, double xVelocity, double yVelocity, double radius, double orientation)
      Create a new ship with the given position, velocity, radius and orientation (in radians).
      double[] getCollisionPosition(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Return the first position where ship1 and ship2 collide, or null if they never collide.
      double getDistanceBetween(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Return the distance between ship1 and ship2.
      double getShipOrientation(Ship ship)
      Return the orientation of ship (in radians).
      double[] getShipPosition(Ship ship)
      Return the position of ship as an array of length 2, with the x-coordinate at index 0 and the y-coordinate at index 1.
      double getShipRadius(Ship ship)
      Return the radius of ship.
      double[] getShipVelocity(Ship ship)
      Return the velocity of ship as an array of length 2, with the velocity along the X-axis at index 0 and the velocity along the Y-axis at index 1.
      double getTimeToCollision(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Return the number of seconds until the first collision between ship1 and ship2, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if they never collide.
      void killVelocity(Ship ship)
      update ship's velocity to cancel all movement, by setting the velocity to zero.
      void move(Ship ship, double dt)
      Update ship's position, assuming it moves dt seconds at its current velocity.
      boolean overlap(Ship ship1, Ship ship2)
      Check whether ship1 and ship2 overlap.
      void thrust(Ship ship, double amount)
      Update ship's velocity based on its current velocity, its direction and the given amount.
      void turn(Ship ship, double angle)
      Update the direction of ship by adding angle (in radians) to its current direction. angle may be negative.

      • createShip

        public Ship createShip()
                throws ModelException
        Create a new ship with a default position, velocity, radius and direction. Result is a unit circle centered on (0, 0) facing right. Its speed is zero.
        Specified by:
        createShip in interface IFacade
        Throws:
        ModelException

      • getDistanceBetween

        public double getDistanceBetween(Ship ship1,
                                 Ship ship2)
                          throws ModelException
        Return the distance between ship1 and ship2. The absolute value of the result of this method is the minimum distance either ship should move such that both ships are adjacent. Note that the result must be negative if the ships overlap. The distance between a ship and itself is 0.
        Specified by:
        getDistanceBetween in interface IFacade
        Throws:
        ModelException

      • overlap

        public boolean overlap(Ship ship1,
                       Ship ship2)
                throws ModelException
        Check whether ship1 and ship2 overlap. A ship always overlaps with itself.
        Specified by:
        overlap in interface IFacade
        Throws:
        ModelException

      • getTimeToCollision

        public double getTimeToCollision(Ship ship1,
                                 Ship ship2)
                          throws ModelException
        Return the number of seconds until the first collision between ship1 and ship2, or Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if they never collide. A ship never collides with itself.
        Specified by:
        getTimeToCollision in interface IFacade
        Throws:
        ModelException

      • getCollisionPosition

        public double[] getCollisionPosition(Ship ship1,
                                     Ship ship2)
                              throws ModelException
        Return the first position where ship1 and ship2 collide, or null if they never collide. A ship never collides with itself. The result of this method is either null or an array of length 2, where the element at index 0 represents the x-coordinate and the element at index 1 represents the y-coordinate.
        Specified by:
        getCollisionPosition in interface IFacade
        Throws:
        ModelException
